tool.name: chewBBACA AlleleCallEvaluator
tool.description: Build an interactive report for allele calling results evaluation
tool.command:
mkdir './input' && mkdir './schema' && #for $file in $input_file cp $file './input/${file.element_identifier}' && #end for unzip $input_schema -d './schema' && chewBBACA.py AlleleCall #if str($training_file) != 'None' --ptf $training_file #end if --bsr $blast_score_ratio --l $minimum_length --t $translation_table --st $size_threshold $no_inferred --pm $prodigal_mode --mode $mode --force-continue -i './input' -g './schema/schema_seed/' -o './output'
chewBBACA.py AlleleCallEvaluator -i AlleleCall/ -g schema_seed/ -o output/
